bug.title: Капча
bug.body: После ввода капчи ничего не происходит, появляется сообщение неправильная капча, с чем в корне не согласен, попадалась капча с четко нарисованными цифрами, все ввел, перепроверил, исход тот же. телеф oukitel k10000pro

bug.title: Whatanime has changed their domain name -needs to be fixed
bug.body: Searching images on whatanime doesn't work anymore because they've changed their domain name to trace.moe

bug.title: Не загружаются картинки
bug.body: Ни с двача ни с форчана уже несколько дней не удается загрузить картинки, статус всегда "не загружено".

bug.title: Капча на форче
bug.body: Капча просто убийственно долгая, тупит невозможно. По двадцать раз приходится выбирать светофоры, и все равно ничего не происходит.

bug.title: Search Image [whatanime.ga] doesn't work
bug.body: Basically whatanime.ga moved to trace.moe, ergo this function doesn't work.

bug.title: Captchas not working in latest release.
bug.body: In the latest release (2.10.4), the captchas are not working, at least for 4chan. Steps to reproduce: 1) Install latest version with 4chan and webm support. 2) Try to post, load the captcha. 3) Complete the captcha successfully and post. 4) Try to post again. When you try to post again, the captcha will disappear every time you select a "square" of it, only to reappear again with the same problem. This happens a couple times more until it gives up and keeps trying to load the post to no avail. The weird thing is, the first time you try to post the captcha works fine, however every time after that it won't work at all. The captcha is working fine on 2.10.3. Cheers.

bug.title: "No extensions installed" error
bug.body: After upgrading to Android Oreo, dashchan has intermittently been losing contact with the 8ch and 4chan extensions on launch and only loads the menu. Clearing cache, wiping data, or even uninstalling the app does not fix it. The extensions link back up seemingly at random and then the app functions as it should.

bug.title: Вылетает при попытке поделиться файлом
bug.body: Система: Android 8.0 При попытке поделиться любым файлом, будь то изображение или вебм, вылетает дашчан. Прикрепляю лог ниже. [error-1515008297425.txt](https://github.com/Mishiranu/Dashchan/files/1601487/error-1515008297425.txt)

bug.title: Recaprcha v2 dvach
bug.body: Рекапча с "машинами" и "дорожными знаками", а может быть и ещё , что-то, не отображает текст " нажмите на картинки с машинами/дорожными знаками", а просто картинки без надписи сверху, в то время как с "мостами", " автобусами" и "домами" всё в порядке, и над картинками висит надпись "select all images with an bus/appartament building/bridges".

bug.title: Плагин 2ch не работает
bug.body: Тут это... 2ч отвалился

bug.title: New bug
bug.body: На днях обновил телефон до android 7.0 NRD90M, Miui 9.1.1.0. После этого пропали надписи на экране (captions), которые при открытии тредов выскакивали с кол-вом новых сообщений и кнопкой "к новым постам" - это самая офигенная фича и она отвалилась. Можно это починить? Версия сброки 2.10.3, если что.

bug.title: Wizchan
bug.body: Most thumbnail pics on Wizchan aren showing up as triangles with exclamation marks in them. Any way to fix it?

bug.title: "Load nearest image" not working properly
bug.body: I have it set to "Always" but when I swipe to the next image it shows the thumbnail while the full resolution version loads. To confirm this I set the option "Load thumbnails" to "Never" then I get a blank space while the image loads.

bug.title: 8ch Images don't load
bug.body: I think that 8ch has changed the location where images are stored, so all images are now broken, except for cached images and thumbnails.

bug.title: Модули не устанавливаются в среде Samsung My Knox
bug.body: При попытке установить любой модуль в среде My Knox, моментально выходит ошибка "Приложение несовместимо с вашим устройством". Прошу извинить за "индивидуальную" просьбу, но можете ли вы, Mishiranu, собрать один apk из Dashchan, модуля Двача и webm-кодеков?

bug.title: Lainchan.org module doesn't work
bug.body: As title say. They remade the site while ago, maybe something changed and broken the module.

bug.title: picture overview bug
bug.body: [If a thread has a lot of images and you try to do the picture overview, it will just crash](https://youtu.be/xZt855FqNFc) https://endchan.xyz/pol/res/34243.html Try this thread for example. Also can you make it so we can change the direction the picture overview works?

bug.title: endchan bug
bug.body: Sometimes I make a mistake trying to post a thread, but when i fix it i get a captcha error. Happens on /pol/.

bug.title: Глюк гуя
bug.body: Если быстро два раза нажать на ссылку на ответ пока он открывается, то он откроется 2 раза. Поставь и проверяй флаг, что ли.

bug.title: Archivers won't load threads?
bug.body: 4plebs.org:------When I load the catalog at /HR/ for example I'm able to load it, and clicking on the preview works, but when i click at a post it displays nothing except for "this thread doesn't exist". This happens the same for other archives but they wont even load the catalog like asia.rbt

bug.title: "Unable to download data" after solving captcha
bug.body: I can't post on 4chan. After resolving captcha I get the abovementioned notification. I was wandering if it's due to using cerberus

bug.title: 8chan extension 403 Forbidden
bug.body: Unable to access 8chan. Maybe due to the security fixes recently implemented? Visiting results in 403 Forbidden.

bug.title: Issue in posting in 4chan using reCAPTCHA v2
bug.body: I noticed a few days ago that I was having issues with the captcha. I was using reCAPTCHA v2 but kept getting the "invalid captcha error" even though I already **unchecked** the "Use Javascript for reCAPTCHA". The only way I was able to post again was to change the CAPTCHA to v1. Am I missing something to not be able to use reCAPTCHA v2 properly?

bug.title: Unable to create posts in 4chan
bug.body: If I use the old captcha, no matter how many times I input it, it tells me "Captcha is not valid", and when I use Captcha 2 (Where you have to click squares), most of the time it doesn't even load.

bug.title: Lainchan submissions are always spoilered
bug.body: Hey, I found a small issue with the Lainchan extension. Scenario: 1. Make post with image 2. Submit Result: Image is spoilered no matter what. Device: HTC 10, Android 7.0, Dashchan v2.9.0, Extension v1.3 Regardless, thanks for working on this great app!

bug.title: can't upload any files for 8ch.net
bug.body: Every time I try attaching an image/video to a post, a message just pops up, reading "invalid server response". There are no other connection issues, I can make text only posts, I can attach files to posts on other extensions, and I tried changing image settings. It only happened after getting the latest patch. I'm on a motorola xoom.

bug.title: Highlighting the bottom post of a threads crashes the app
bug.body: Device: HTC 10, Android 7.0 If I try to double tap the bottom/last post of a thread to select its text, the app crashes sometimes.

bug.title: 7chan board /eh/ doesn't load
bug.body: It just shows a text saying "Invalid server response".

bug.title: Captchas don't work if JavaScript versions are enabled
bug.body: If the option to use JavaScript for captchas is enabled, they don't seem to work. `Failed to download data` Android 7.1.1

bug.title: App aways starting with burichan light theme enabled.
bug.body: I have to change manually everytime when I start the app. This theme is like battery acid on my eyes. Is this a bug?

bug.title: Small typo in settings-info (Portuguese)

bug.title: 0chan.cc
bug.body: У нульчана заблокировали домен,сделай чтобы с его айпи 31.220.3.61 зайти можно было

bug.title: Thumbnails don't load in local host (and suggestions related to local host)
bug.body: In the previous version thumbnails was loading without problems, but now they aren't loading. I tried everything except cleaning app data (I have many favorites saved and I don't want lost) You remember the suggestion about archiving threads with their original names? Since this isn't possible I have other idea, and at same time a question. When you save an image and the dialog prompt ask to save file and choose the location, the app asks to save with their original names and detailed names, in this process what your app do? It renames the original filename (according to server name with details/or original filenames? If any of my thoughts are correct.. My request is, in local host, when you save files in the localhost gallery or individually, the app rename the file to their original filenames or detailed (user choice) using the same method above. And other request, is it possible to make a custom directory setting when saving files in local host (in the folder called localhost/null and the threads) like I requested In the past. Thank you so much.

bug.title: Ponychan Doesn't Work
bug.body: Opening a Ponychan thread just says "Invalid server response".

bug.title: Captchas not rendering properly.
bug.body: When I try to reply, I load the captcha and this is how it appears: http://i.imgur.com/Kgkbn1z.png I can't see nor click the images. Don't mind the red hue, it's just Twilight.

bug.title: Can't tap to read spoilers of an OP without opening the thread.
bug.body: e.g.: http://a.pomf.cat/smmqdy.mp4

bug.title: Clean installed and can't do much.
bug.body: I clean installed the Main .apk, 4chan apk, and the WebM apk. Now, I can't change the theme or open any images. Latest versions installed as of this moment.

bug.title: Make it harder to swipe to next image.
bug.body: A constant problem that I have is that when I'm zooming into images, it's way too easy to swipe to the next image. An easy solution is to not swipe to the next image when zoomed in.

bug.title: Клиент падает при попытку скопироватб или цитировать.
bug.body: Началось пару мажорных апдейиов назад уже несколько месяцев. Одинаково как на планшете с Android 5.0.2 (не обновлял с апреля) так и на телефоне со свежим 6.0.1 и factory reset. Как повторить - виделить любой текст и нажать кнопку копировать или цитировать и приложение сразу падает. Каждый раз. Приаттачил лог креша [error-1450555480286.txt](https://github.com/Mishiranu/Dashchan/files/67593/error-1450555480286.txt)

bug.title: Can't write to SD card (external) even allowing the app to write
bug.body: Phone model: Galaxy S4 GT-i9505 - ROM JDCT ROM 6.0.

bug.title: Small Typo in Settings
bug.body: Preferences > Contents > Clear cache, thumbnails is spelt "thumnails".

bug.title: Invalid server response (error) when browsing 8ch.net
bug.body: Happens when I'm swiping to reach at page 2, after this a toast notification says "invalid server response." Reloading board doesn't works.

bug.title: captcha expired
bug.body: help, it's impossible to post because it keeps saying captcha expired

bug.title: Rbt.asia thumbnails
bug.body: Can you make it so rbt.asia can actually open up images? On the site I can open the full image but on the app all pictures are thumbnails.

bug.title: "No access to memory" error on Nexus 7 (2013, Wi-Fi), Android 6.0
bug.body: After updating to 6.0 I can no longer open attached media, always getting the "No access to memory error". Thumbnails display fine.

bug.title: App crashes if gallery opened before thread loaded
bug.body: Version: App: 2.2.0 (03.09.2015) 4chan extension: 1.1 STEPS_TO_REPRODUCE: 1. Открыть тред. 2. Открыть галерею до того как содержимое треда загрузится. 3. В приложении "Dashchan" произошла ошибка. Воспроизводится стабильно, желательно открывать большой тред.

bug.title: Crashes when clicking a youtube thumbnail from an Opening Post
bug.body: If you spot a thread where the Opening Post contains a youtube thumbnail instead of a conventional image, and click on it, the app will crash. This happens on 8ch. I haven't tried to reproduce this problem on other imageboards tho.

bug.body: http://i.imgur.com/3FC5SWk.png http://i.imgur.com/Jjqz5GZ.png

bug.title: Issue with links
bug.body: The embedded links always cut off letters at the end. Please fix it. Thank you.
